expensesdb

Class ExpensesDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • expensesdb.ExpensesDatabase

  • public final class ExpensesDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an example of using the HarambeDB framework to write a static database class and is the final project of the datastructures class.

    This class is a member of the HarambeDB database framework.

    See Also:
    Database, Table, Row

      • userSimilarity

        public static int userSimilarity(java.lang.String xName,
                                 java.lang.String yName)
                          throws hdb.HarambException
        Calculates how similar are two users by expense, similarity is defined as the absolute value of the difference of the expenses of the two users
        Parameters:
        xName - The name of an user
        yName - The name of another user
        Returns:
        The similarity between the users
        Throws:
        hdb.HarambException - If there is some error reading or writing to the database

      • getTotalPayments

        public static int getTotalPayments(java.lang.String userName)
                            throws hdb.HarambException
        Retrieves the total payments of an user
        Parameters:
        userName - The name of the user
        Returns:
        The sum of all his/her expenses payments
        Throws:
        hdb.HarambException - If there is some error reading or writing to the database

        public static void addInvoice(java.lang.String userName,

                              java.lang.String[] itemsNames)
                       throws hdb.HarambException
        Adds an invoice to the invoice table
        Parameters:
        userName - The name of the user this invoice belongs to
        invoiceUID - The invoice number of the this invoice
        itemsNames - The list of items this invoice have
        Throws:
        hdb.HarambException - If there is some error reading or writing to the database
